# oneuptime_scheduled_maintenance_event_data (Data Source)

Scheduled maintenance event data data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "oneuptime_scheduled_maintenance_event_data" "example" {
  name = "example-scheduled_maintenance_event_data"
}
```
